original_text: And Moses and Aaron went in unto Pharaoh, and they did so as the Lord had commanded: and Aaron cast down his rod before Pharaoh, and before his servants, and it became a serpent.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 바로에게 가서 여호와께서 명령하신 대로 행하여 아론이 바로와 그의 신하 앞에 지팡이를 던지니 뱀이 된지라

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Aaron went in unto Pharaoh,
and they did so as the Lord had commanded:
and Aaron cast down his rod before Pharaoh,
sentences.korean_translation: 아론이 그의 지팡이를 바로 앞에 던지니
